This document shows how to use *cerUB* protocols to explore petrographic and compositional data. As an example, we provide the 'amphorae' dataset concerning wine Roman amphorae from sites in Catalonia, NE Spain. It is a live version of the Appendix C of a (to be) published article in Journal of Archaeological Science (pending reference).
